example.eg: You should know the difference between cars and trucks.
example.egtrans: 你应该知道卡车和小汽车的差别。

example.eg: We've had our differences over the years, but she's still my friend.
example.egtrans: 多年来，我们曾有过意见分歧的时候，但她一直是我的朋友。

example.eg: The second time we ran the test there was a difference in the outcome.
example.egtrans: 我们第二次进行测试的时候，结果发生了变化。

example.eg: We had a difference of opinion over the subject of capital punishment.
Please give generously; your donations will make a difference. Josie is trying to make a difference by doing charity work.
example.egtrans: 请慷慨捐赠，您的善款会产生重大影响。乔茜试图通过做慈善来造成重大改变。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 产生重大影响，带来重大改变

dsense.name: not make any difference, make no difference
not make any difference, make no difference

example.eg: The election will not make any difference when a dictator is in control.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 没有影响, 不会带来什么不同

example.eg: She could not see the difference between the identical twins.
We decided to split the difference, each paying £1.10 extra.
You want to go to a Chinese restaurant, and I want Mexican.  Let's split the difference and get a pizza.
